content: multi-size basic doll top constructed top down flat and seamless let your creativity flow this pattern is perfect as a jumping point for lace collars sleeves stripes or wherever your imagination takes you includes 6 different sizes to clothe my entire doll collection suitable for beginners pattern is not instructional and assumes basic knitting knowledge and how to find help sizes cover dolls such as australian girl american girl gotz hannah and happy kidz kidz n cats hearts for hearts les cheries las amigas and mini american girl one of these variations should fit your doll gauge varies according to size you are making different needles and gauge are used to obtain different sizes mini size uses fingering yarn all other sizes use dk yarn just match the stated gauge and you will be fine correction- v 2 only- where it says row 24-26 knit it should say row 25 knit row 24 and 26 are wrong side row and should be worked as indicated
